description: Riot police face away from the viewer, observing a chaotic scene where protesters holding signs are gathered near a building, with one figure lying on the ground. An ice cream truck, shaped like a giant popsicle and cone, drives through, blaring music. The absurd sight of the cheerful, themed vehicle entering the tense confrontation creates a stark, ironic contrast. The specific design of the truck and its presence in this environment introduce a surreal element. The juxtaposition highlights the strange interruptions of the mundane into moments of conflict.

other_text.text: GET THE NO! OUT THE NOW!
